mapper.select:
select from ticket t
1=1
and t.title like concat(concat('%',#{condition.title}),'%')

mapper.update:
update ticket
tn = #{tn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
queue_id = #{queueId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ticket_lock_id = #{ticketLockId,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
service_id = #{serviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sla_id = #{slaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
responsible_user_id = #{responsibleUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ticket_priority_id = #{ticketPriorityId,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
ticket_state_id = #{ticketStateId,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_user_id = #{customerUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
timeout = #{timeout,jdbcType=INTEGER},
until_time = #{untilTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
escalation_time = #{escalationTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
escalation_update_time = #{escalationUpdateTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
escalation_response_time = #{escalationResponseTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
escalation_solution_time = #{escalationSolutionTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},

create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
change_time = #{changeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
change_by = #{changeBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
